<!-- Code generated by cmd/docsgen. DO NOT EDIT. -->

# Lineage Endpoints

Table lineage tracking and management.

## `GET /lineage/columns/{schemaName}/{tableName}`

Get column-level lineage for a table

Returns column-level lineage edges showing how each output column traces back to source columns.

- Operation ID: `getColumnLineage`

### Path Parameters

| Name | Type | Required | Description |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| `schemaName` | `string` | `true` | Name of the database schema. |
| `tableName` | `string` | `true` | Name of the table. |

### Query Parameters

| Name | Type | Required | Description |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| `max_results` | `integer` | `false` | Maximum number of results to return per page. |
| `page_token` | `string` | `false` | Opaque pagination token from a previous response. |

### Responses

| Code | Description |
| --- | --- |
| `200` | Column lineage edges |
| `400` | Invalid request parameters or malformed request body. |
| `401` | Authentication credentials are missing or invalid. |
| `404` | The requested resource was not found. |
| `429` | Rate limit exceeded. Retry after the indicated duration. |
| `500` | An unexpected internal server error occurred. |

## `GET /lineage/columns/{schemaName}/{tableName}/{columnName}/impact`

Get impact analysis for a source column

Returns all column-level lineage edges that originate from the specified source column, showing which downstream columns are affected.

- Operation ID: `getColumnImpact`

### Path Parameters

| Name | Type | Required | Description |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| `columnName` | `string` | `true` | Name of the column. |
| `schemaName` | `string` | `true` | Name of the database schema. |
| `tableName` | `string` | `true` | Name of the table. |

### Query Parameters

| Name | Type | Required | Description |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| `max_results` | `integer` | `false` | Maximum number of results to return per page. |
| `page_token` | `string` | `false` | Opaque pagination token from a previous response. |

### Responses

| Code | Description |
| --- | --- |
| `200` | Column impact edges |
| `400` | Invalid request parameters or malformed request body. |
| `401` | Authentication credentials are missing or invalid. |
| `404` | The requested resource was not found. |
| `429` | Rate limit exceeded. Retry after the indicated duration. |
| `500` | An unexpected internal server error occurred. |

## `DELETE /lineage/edges/{edgeId}`

Delete a lineage edge

Permanently removes a lineage edge by its identifier.

- Operation ID: `deleteLineageEdge`

### Path Parameters

| Name | Type | Required | Description |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| `edgeId` | `string` | `true` | Unique identifier of the lineage edge. |

### Responses

| Code | Description |
| --- | --- |
| `204` | Edge deleted |
| `400` | Invalid request parameters or malformed request body. |
| `401` | Authentication credentials are missing or invalid. |
| `403` | Insufficient privileges to perform this operation. |
| `404` | The requested resource was not found. |
| `429` | Rate limit exceeded. Retry after the indicated duration. |
| `500` | An unexpected internal server error occurred. |

## `POST /lineage/purge`

Purge old lineage edges

Delete lineage edges older than the specified number of days.

- Operation ID: `purgeLineage`

### Request Body

- Required: `true`
- Content types: `application/json`

### Responses

| Code | Description |
| --- | --- |
| `200` | Purge result |
| `400` | Invalid request parameters or malformed request body. |
| `401` | Authentication credentials are missing or invalid. |
| `403` | Insufficient privileges to perform this operation. |
| `429` | Rate limit exceeded. Retry after the indicated duration. |
| `500` | An unexpected internal server error occurred. |

## `GET /lineage/tables/{schemaName}/{tableName}`

Get full lineage for a table

Returns both upstream and downstream lineage edges for a table. Pagination params control edge depth, not list pagination.

- Operation ID: `getTableLineage`

### Path Parameters

| Name | Type | Required | Description |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| `schemaName` | `string` | `true` | Name of the database schema. |
| `tableName` | `string` | `true` | Name of the table. |

### Query Parameters

| Name | Type | Required | Description |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| `max_results` | `integer` | `false` | Maximum number of results to return per page. |
| `page_token` | `string` | `false` | Opaque pagination token from a previous response. |

### Responses

| Code | Description |
| --- | --- |
| `200` | Table lineage |
| `400` | Invalid request parameters or malformed request body. |
| `401` | Authentication credentials are missing or invalid. |
| `404` | The requested resource was not found. |
| `429` | Rate limit exceeded. Retry after the indicated duration. |
| `500` | An unexpected internal server error occurred. |

## `GET /lineage/tables/{schemaName}/{tableName}/downstream`

Get downstream lineage for a table

Returns the downstream lineage edges representing tables and views that depend on the specified table.

- Operation ID: `getDownstreamLineage`

### Path Parameters

| Name | Type | Required | Description |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| `schemaName` | `string` | `true` | Name of the database schema. |
| `tableName` | `string` | `true` | Name of the table. |

### Query Parameters

| Name | Type | Required | Description |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| `max_results` | `integer` | `false` | Maximum number of results to return per page. |
| `page_token` | `string` | `false` | Opaque pagination token from a previous response. |

### Responses

| Code | Description |
| --- | --- |
| `200` | Downstream lineage edges |
| `400` | Invalid request parameters or malformed request body. |
| `401` | Authentication credentials are missing or invalid. |
| `404` | The requested resource was not found. |
| `429` | Rate limit exceeded. Retry after the indicated duration. |
| `500` | An unexpected internal server error occurred. |

## `GET /lineage/tables/{schemaName}/{tableName}/upstream`

Get upstream lineage for a table

Returns the upstream lineage edges representing data sources that feed into the specified table.

- Operation ID: `getUpstreamLineage`

### Path Parameters

| Name | Type | Required | Description |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| `schemaName` | `string` | `true` | Name of the database schema. |
| `tableName` | `string` | `true` | Name of the table. |

### Query Parameters

| Name | Type | Required | Description |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| `max_results` | `integer` | `false` | Maximum number of results to return per page. |
| `page_token` | `string` | `false` | Opaque pagination token from a previous response. |

### Responses

| Code | Description |
| --- | --- |
| `200` | Upstream lineage edges |
| `400` | Invalid request parameters or malformed request body. |
| `401` | Authentication credentials are missing or invalid. |
| `404` | The requested resource was not found. |
| `429` | Rate limit exceeded. Retry after the indicated duration. |
| `500` | An unexpected internal server error occurred. |
